body: @QwertySmurfy *Sigh* Once again...a couple doesn't actually have to be going out for it to be NTR...it just has to be from the cuck's PoV and the two have to have mutual feelings for each other. More importantly is the feeling of loss and betrayal on the part of the MC. That's what makes NTR.

Fuck. This. Shit. I wanted to like this, because the art style is really good. But I can't do it. I know it doesn't count as NTR as the MC isn't going out with her, but it still gives me that vibe that I despise so much that stems from NTR.
